content: वैशेषिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Characteristic. {@--2@} Belonging to the Vaiśeshika doctrine. --कः A follower of the Vaiśeṣika doctrine. --कं [ विशेषं पदार्थमेदमधिकृत्य कृतो ग्रंथः ठञ्] One of the six principal Darśanas or systems of Hindu philosophy founded by Kaṇāda; it differs from the Nyāya philosophy of Gautama in that it recognizes only seven instead of sixteen categories or heads of predicables (the earlier writers, {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} Kaṇāda recognizing only six), and lays particular stress upon Viśeṣa.
